creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
Just using the 
<jdepend format="xml" outputfile="docs/jdepend-report.xml"             
classpathref="path/to/jdepend.jar"> obviously wouldn't do it.

It would be great to mention this in
http://www.clarkware.com/software/JDepend.html#ant too.

You have to read %ANT_HOME%/docs/manual/install.html#librarydependencies
The use of <jdepend/> requires an installation of clarware´s JDepend library 
described there.
creator: jan@materne.de
